articles.author: Shane Dixon Kavanaugh | The Oregonian/OregonLive
articles.title: Teen accused of plunging kitchen knife into neck of sleeping grandmother, authorities say
articles.description: The 14-year-old boy is also suspected of recently stabbing his mother in a separate incident, the Cowlitz County Sheriff's  Office said Tuesday.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: 13-year-old boy arrested in fatal shooting of friend in Cowlitz County
articles.description: Authorities say the boy who was arrested called 911 on the day of the shooting and said he had shot his friend while playing with a gun.

articles.author: Jamie Hale | The Oregonian/OregonLive
articles.title: Teen arrested for manslaughter after shooting friend in Kelso
articles.description: The 13-year-old Kelso boy maintains the shooting was an accident, but faces a felony charge regardless.

articles.title: 13-year-old boy arrested in fatal shooting of friend
articles.description: Jackson TN News - jacksonsun.com is the home page of Jackson TN with in depth and updated Jackson local news. Stay informed with both Jackson TN news as well as headlines and stories from around the world.

articles.title: 13-year-old boy arrested in fatal shooting of friend
articles.description: KELSO, Wash. (AP) — Authorities say a 13-year-old boy has been arrested in connection with the Oct. 14 shooting death of his friend.

articles.author: By JORDAN NAILON The Chronicle
articles.title: Investigation into Washington poaching widens
articles.description: CENTRALIA, Wash. (AP) — The scope of a large scale investigation into a network of poachers based out of Southwest Washington continues to widen, and the most recent development has put the focus on new defendants in Lewis County.

articles.author: Seattle Times editorial board
articles.title: Fund alternatives to keep truants and runaways out of jail
articles.description: State officials have been working to reduce how often counties jail children for noncriminal offenses, such as running away or skipping school. The work is not over.

articles.author: By Joel Connelly, SeattlePI.com
articles.title: Connelly: State nixes key permit for big Longview coal terminal
articles.description: A big blow to Big Coal:  The Washington Department of Ecology denies a key water quality permit to builders of the proposed Millennium Bulk Terminals coal export terminal in Longview.  It would be the largest coal export facility in North America with a capac…

articles.author: jenna
articles.title: State Denies Key Water Quality Permit For Longview Coal Project
articles.description: Earthjustice The Washington Department of Ecology denied a necessary water quality permit for the proposed Millennium Bulk Terminals coal export facility in Longview today, citing the project’s negative impacts on climate, clean air and water. Absent a succes…
